summary.span: 开始数据库事务。

span.span: Starts a database transaction.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要创建您自己的连接类型，重写此方法以实现开始事务所需的代码。If you are creating your own connection type, override this method to implement the code necessary to begin a transaction.

summary.span: 开始数据库事务。

span.span: Starts a database transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不指定隔离级别，使用特定类型的连接的默认隔离级别。If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level for the specific type of connection is used.

summary.span: 为打开的连接更改当前数据库。

span.span: Changes the current database for an open connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中提供的值`databaseName`参数必须是当前实例的有效的数据库名称。The value supplied in the `databaseName` parameter must be a valid database name for the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭与数据库之间的连接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the database.

summary.span: 此方法是关闭任何打开连接的首选方法。

span.span: This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法回滚任何挂起的事务。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然后，它将释放到连接池，连接或关闭的连接，如果禁用连接池。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 应用程序可以调用不止一次。An application can call more than one time. 不会生成异常。No exception is generated. 如果超出范围，它没有闭合是。If the goes out of scope, it is not closed. 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用`Close`或`Dispose`，这在功能上等效。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`, which are functionally equivalent. 如果连接池值`Pooling`设置为`true`或`yes`，则也会释放物理连接。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, this also releases the physical connection. > [!CAUTION] > 不要调用`Close`或`Dispose`上**连接**、 **DataReader**，或在任何其他托管的对象`Finalize`你类的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a **Connection**, a **DataReader**, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，你应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9).

exception.span: 打开连接时出现的连接级别的错误。

span.span: The connection-level error that occurred while opening the connection.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string ConnectionString { get; set; }
Public MustOverride Property ConnectionString As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ ConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于打开连接的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open the connection.

value.span: 用来建立初始连接的连接字符串。

span.span: The connection string used to establish the initial connection.

value.span: 该连接字符串的确切内容取决于此连接的特定数据源。

span.span: The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该连接字符串的确切内容取决于此连接的特定数据源。The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection. 若要确定哪些设置有效，请参阅你使用的连接的特定类型的文档。To determine which settings are valid, see the documentation for the specific type of connection that you are using.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ConnectionTimeout As Integer
public: virtual property int ConnectionTimeout { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取在建立连接时终止尝试并生成错误之前所等待的时间。

span.span: Gets the time to wait while establishing a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

value.span: 等待连接打开所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.

value.span: 默认值是由您正在使用的连接的特定类型确定的。

span.span: The default value is determined by the specific type of connection that you are using.

summary.span: 在连接打开之后获取当前数据库的名称，或者在连接打开之前获取连接字符串中指定的数据库名。

span.span: Gets the name of the current database after a connection is opened, or the database name specified in the connection string before the connection is opened.

value.span: 当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

span.span: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接通常此属性动态更改时，更新当前数据库。A connection typically updates this property dynamically when the current database changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DataSource As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ DataSource { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取要连接的数据库服务器的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the database server to which to connect.

value.span: 要连接的数据库服务器的名称。

span.span: The name of the database server to which to connect.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据库的连接已关闭，返回中包含的所有内容为`DataSource`关键字。If the connection to the database is closed, the returns whatever is contained in the for the `DataSource` keyword. 如果连接是打开和数据源关键字的值开头"|`datadirectory`|"，该属性返回中包含的所有内容为`DataSource`仅关键字。If the connection is open and the data source keyword's value starts with "|`datadirectory`|", the property returns whatever is contained in the for the `DataSource` keyword only. 如果数据库的连接处于打开状态，该属性返回本机提供程序返回有关`DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`，和的是否为空，本机提供程序的`DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME`返回。If the connection to the database is open, the property returns what the native provider returns for the `DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`, and if that is empty, the native provider's `DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME` is returned.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对用于登记的现有 的引用。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 在指定事务中登记。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增 ADO.NET 2.0 中功能支持使用`EnlistTransaction`方法在分布式事务中登记。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the `EnlistTransaction` method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因为它登记中的连接实例，`EnlistTransaction`中可用的功能利用命名空间用于管理分布式事务。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, `EnlistTransaction` takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions. 连接程序显式在事务中登记之后，它无法取消登记或第一个事务完成之前在另一个事务中登记。Once a connection is explicitly enlisted in a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes.

summary.span: 返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果连接与事务相关联，则执行`GetSchema`调用可能会导致某些提供程序引发异常。If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.

span.span: is specified as null.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetSchema (collectionName As String, restrictionValues As String()) As DataTable
public: virtual System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchema(System::String ^ collectionName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ restrictionValues);

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

param.name: restrictionValues
param.span: 为请求的架构指定一组限制值。

span.span: Specifies a set of restriction values for the requested schema.

summary.span: 使用表示架构名称的指定字符串以及表示限制值的指定字符串数组返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `restrictionValues`参数可以提供*n*深度的值，指定特定集合的限制集合。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values, which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 为了对给定的限制，设置值和设置的其他限制的值，你需要设置前面的限制条件为 null，然后为你想要为指定值的限制中的相应值。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 此示例为"表"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果"表"集合具有三个限制 （数据库、 所有者和表名称），并且你想要取回仅与"Carl"的所有者关联的表，则必须传递以下值至少： null，"Carl"。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions (database, owner, and table name) and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", you must pass in the following values at least: null, "Carl". 如果未传入限制值，默认值用于该限制。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 这将是相同的映射与传入 null，这是不同于传入的参数值为空字符串。This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在这种情况下，空字符串 ("") 被视为可为指定的参数的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. 如果连接与事务相关联，则执行`GetSchema`调用可能会导致某些提供程序引发异常。If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.

span.span: is specified as null.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关概述，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For an overview, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Open() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 所指定的设置打开数据库连接。

span.span: Opens a database connection with the settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用用户定义的行为，必须重写此方法。This method must be overridden with user-defined behavior. 如果情况下再次调用将引发异常前关闭。 will throw an exception if called again without first being closed.

exception.span: 打开集合时发生的错误。

span.span: An error occurred while opening the connection.

summary.span: 此方法实现 的异步版本。

span.span: This method implements an asynchronous version of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序中的异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task OpenAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 的异步版本，打开由 指定的设置的数据库连接。

span.span: An asynchronous version of , which opens a database connection with the settings specified by the .

summary.span: 此方法通过 CancellationToken.None 调用虚拟方法 。

span.span: This method invokes the virtual method with CancellationToken.None.
A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用，必须返回直到返回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然后，如果连接成功，必须返回。Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果连接失败，必须返回。If the connection fails, must return . 调用将尝试取消或关闭相应调用。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 有关 SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序中的异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task OpenAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

span.span: The cancellation instruction.

summary.span: 这是 的异步版本。

span.span: This is the asynchronous version of .

summary.span: 提供程序应使用合适的实现进行重写。

span.span: Providers should override with an appropriate implementation.

summary.span: 可选择性接受取消标记。

span.span: The cancellation token can optionally be honored.

summary.span: 默认实现调用同步 调用并返回已完成任务。

span.span: The default implementation invokes the synchronous call and returns a completed task.

summary.span: 如果传递到已取消的取消标记，则默认实现将返回已取消的 cancellationToken。

span.span: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellationToken.

summary.span: Open 引发的异常将通过返回的任务异常属性传递。

span.span: Exceptions thrown by Open will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.

summary.span: 在返回的任务完成前，不要调用 对象的其他方法和属性。

span.span: Do not invoke other methods and properties of the object until the returned Task is complete.
A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用，必须返回直到返回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然后，如果连接成功，必须返回。Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果连接失败，必须返回。If the connection fails, must return . 调用将尝试取消或关闭相应调用。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 有关 SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序中的异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
